description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Physical description: 13 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink with use of red. Headings in red with black vocalization. European paper. Leaves missing between fol. 6 and 7, 14 and 15. Fol. 55 consists of two pasted leaves.
author: Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq
abstract: Acephalous and defective copy of a collection of twenty-five texts of the Druze community, comprising texts 15-23 and 25-40 in Sylvestre de Sacy's description of Druze writings in Exposé de la religion des Druzes (1838). The Risālat al-Inṣināʼ (text 24) does not appear in this copy.
contents: 3. fol. 22b-34b: Risālat al-Tanzīh ilá jamāʻat al-Muwaḥḥidīn wa-rufiʻat ilá al-Ḥaḍrah al-lāhūtīyah wa-uṭliqat.
9. fol. 60b-62b: Mukātabah ilá ahl al-Kudīyah al-bayḍāʼ.
10. fol. 63a: [Crossed out text, corresponding to the last page of the previous text].
12. fol. 65b-67a: al-Risālah allatī ursilat ilá walī al-ʻahd ʻahd al-muslimīn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Ilyās.
13. fol. 67a-69a: Risālat Khumār Ibn Jaysh al-Sulaymānī al-ʻAkāwī.
17. fol. 81b-83a: al-Taqdīs duʻāʼ al-sādiqīn duʻāʼ li-najāt al-Muwaḥḥidīn al-ʻārifīn.
18. fol. 83a-84b: Dhikr maʻrifat al-Imām wa-asmāʼ al-Ḥudūd al-ʻulwīyah rūḥānī wa-jusmānī.
20. fol. 89a-92a: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Iʻdhār wa-al-indhār al-shāfīyah li-qulūb ahl al-ḥaqq min al-marḍ wa-al-iḥtiyār.
22. fol. 102a-117a: Kitāb fīhi taqsīm al-ʻulūm wa-ithbāt al-ḥaqq wa-kashf al-maknūn.
23. fol. 117a-123b: al-Mawsūmah Risālat al-zinād wa-al-sabīl al-wāḍiḥ lil-ṭālib al-murtād.
24. fol. 124a-130a: al-Mawsūmah Risālat al-Shamʻah wa-mathaluhā fī al-tawḥīd wa-mathalu ḥudūdihā ʻalá al-maslak al-thālith.
27. fol. 140b-143a: [Short texts by another hand, starting with the words "Maʻrifat al-ʻaql annahu ʻillat al-ʻilal" ; "Dhikr al-maqāmāt al-ʻashrah al-ʻAlī al-Bār", etc.]
extent: 143 leaves: paper ; 150 x 105 (105 x 85) mm. bound to 155 x 110 mm.
creator: Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq
رسالة الدامغة للفاسق
subject: Druzes—Sacred books
binding_note: Brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers, fore-edge flap and envelope flap. Both covers have a central panel with a red stamped mandorla, outlined in gold, developing into a chain motif linking to the outer border on the vertical axis. Gold motifs in the inner corners. Outer border consists of a guilloche and several fillets. Portion of the same decoration on the envelope flap. Line of flower motifs on the fore-edge flap. Paper pastedowns. Leather with one flower motif on the fore-edge flap. Spine wanting.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
